headline: LTX, A Broadridge Company, Announces Strategic Partnership with TransFICC to Improve Connectivity and Onboarding Speeds
summary: LTX, an AI-powered fixed income trading platform backed by global Fintech leader, Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. (NYSE:BR), today announced its strategic partnership with TransFICC, a leading provider of e-trading technology for fixed income markets. This collaboration enables dealers to more quickly and efficiently onboard and connect to LTX, via TransFICC's One API for eTrading platform.
